trailer.title: Official Trailer | 20th Anniversary Restoration
trailer.text: IN THE MOOD FOR LOVE celebrates its 20th anniversary with a stunning new restoration. Streaming exclusively in Latin America, Turkey & Scandinavia, plus select cinemas in Mexico and Colombia, as part of 'In Love. The Cinema of Wong Kar Wai'

trailer.title: In the Mood for Love (2000) ORIGINAL TRAILER
trailer.text:
In the Mood for Love (2000) ORIGINAL TRAILER
Directed by Kar-Wai Wong and starring Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung and Ping Lam Siu.

trailer.title: In The Mood For Love - Yumeji's Theme
trailer.text: In The Mood For Love directed by Wong Kar-wai Music: Yumeji's Theme (Extended Version) by Shigeru Umebayashi Original Motion Picture

trailer.title: In The Mood For Love 4K | Official Trailer (English)
trailer.text: To mark the 20th anniversary of IN THE MOOD FOR LOVE, Block 2 Distribution has released a commemorative trailer of the Wong Kar Wai classic.
